title: How is the delivery time calculated?
description: The delivery time displayed at the top of your order is estimated and includes factors such as:
1. The time it typically takes the restaurant to accept and prepare an average order
2. The time we estimate it will take to travel from the restaurant to the delivery address
The stated delivery time is our best prediction but is not a guarantee. Actual delivery time may vary depending on how busy the shop is, the size of your order, traffic conditions, and other factors.
